style_guide.visual_style: Bright, friendly flat illustration style with pastel colors (soft pinks, mint greens, warm yellows, sky blues). Clean, modern Korean cafe aesthetic with playful hand-drawn elements. Warm and inviting mood with pops of color for emphasis on key words. Typography mix of rounded sans-serif for English and clear hangul fonts.
style_guide.segment_story: Two people meeting for the first time at a cafe or casual setting, exchanging friendly introductions and compliments. They discover common interests and the conversation flows naturally from getting-to-know-you questions to a warm invitation to become friends over coffee. The vibe progresses from curious/polite to genuinely excited about the new connection.

images.prompt_used: Two young Korean friends meeting at a cafe table, close-up view showing them from waist up, one person with short bob haircut wearing pastel pink sweater gesturing warmly with open hand, other person with shoulder-length hair in mint green cardigan smiling back with curious friendly expression, both seated close together across small cafe table with coffee cups barely visible at bottom of frame, warm yellow cafe lighting creating intimate atmosphere, soft bokeh background showing blurred cafe interior with plants, bright friendly flat illustration style, pastel color palette of soft pinks mint greens warm yellows sky blues, clean modern Korean aesthetic, playful hand-drawn linework, warm inviting mood, characters fill 70% of frame, eye-level perspective, natural friendly body language showing openness and interest, square 1080x1080 format

Close-up view of a young Korean person with short bob haircut, face filling most of the frame, looking slightly to the side with a warm, genuine smile and bright sparkling eyes showing delight. Soft natural lighting from a cafe window illuminating their face. Bright friendly flat illustration style with pastel colors, clean lines. Blurred soft bokeh background suggesting cafe interior with warm yellows and mint greens. The person's expression radiates genuine happiness and friendliness, as if paying a sincere compliment. Warm and inviting mood with soft pink and peach tones in the lighting.

Wide side view of two young Korean friends sitting across from each other at a small round cafe table, both visible in full seated position from a side angle at table height. One person has short bob haircut wearing pastel pink top, the other has shoulder-length hair in loose waves wearing mint green cardigan. Coffee cups and small pastries on the table between them. Bright modern Korean cafe interior with plants and soft natural lighting through windows. Warm, friendly atmosphere. Flat illustration style with pastel colors - soft pinks, mint greens, warm yellows, sky blues. Clean lines, playful hand-drawn aesthetic, inviting mood.
